project.name: GPS Walker Example
project.description: Simulates plotting Geo coordinates onto a Google map

properties.furtherInfo: The GPS walker demonstrates how to use the iBeans JavaScript client to send and receive AJAX events to and from the browser. There is a server-side component, CityStroller, that uses the iBeans application annotations @Schedule and @Send to repeatedly call a method that generates random Geo coordinates and sends them to the browser to be plotted on a Google Map. The HTML page allows you to switch between cities.
